## Project Title

Calculator is a Python package for performing simple calculator functions:

addition (+)
subtraction (-)
multiplication (*)
division (/)
root of number (âˆš)

## Installation

pip install git+https://github.com/auramila/calculator

# Prerequisites

Additional have to be installed: 
docker build -t calculator .
